This action responds to repeated Houthi assaults involving drones and missiles launched towards Israeli territory. Recent strikes also coincided with funerals for Yemeni journalists reportedly killed in earlier Israeli operations.

Trump also called for NATO allies to sanction China, accusing them of supporting Russia, while notably omitting India from his criticism.

'Deeply concerned': India at UN condemns Israeli strikes in Qatar; urges dialogue
description: India has voiced strong concerns over Israel's recent attack in Doha, denouncing it as a violation of Qatar's sovereignty. At the UN, Arindam Bagchi emphasized peaceful resolution through dialogue, upholding the UN Charter. PM Modi also spoke with Qatar's Emir, condemning the attacks and reaffirming India's support for regional peace and stability, opposing terrorism.

title: Lessons for founders: Zerodha CEO cites Nvidia chief; says success takes time
description: Zerodha CEO Nithin Kamath drew parallels between his firm's journey and Nvidia's, emphasizing the significance of timing and perseverance. Starting with a modest ₹10 lakh investment, Zerodha leveraged free infrastructure and focused on customer-centric policies like 'no spam, no tracking'. Kamath attributes Zerodha's success to being in the right place at the right time, coinciding with India's economic rise.

title: Streamer Destiny under fire: Refuses to condemn Charlie Kirk’s killing; Elon Musk reacts
description: Political streamer Destiny faced backlash after refusing to condemn Charlie Kirk's assassination on Piers Morgan Uncensored, sparking heated debate online. Elon Musk criticized Destiny's stance, suggesting Amazon should stop paying him and advocating for imprisonment for inciting violence. Destiny, known for his polarizing political commentary, has drawn criticism for his outspoken style.

title: AI fashion trend: Google Gemini Nano Banana AI saree goes viral; 5 mistakes to avoid
description: The internet is abuzz with the Google Gemini Nano Banana AI saree trend, transforming selfies into glamorous 90s Bollywood portraits. Users are creating viral images featuring chiffon sarees, grainy textures, and golden-hour lighting using specific AI prompts. To achieve the best results, avoid low-quality photos, vague prompts, and neglecting background details.
